content:
Do any libs folks have opinions about adding a guard page to signal stacks? I filed an issue in response to a security report, and someone made a pull request which now looks good to me.
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/69533
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/69969
I'd be happy to r+ this myself, but I don't want to presume too much
LGTM. I can't see any objections on the principle, and the implementation looks fine.
The code does make the assumption that the stack grows down, but AFAIK that's true for all architectures that we support.
